name: Divya
greetingText: Aka Peanut butter, gold medalist, cute little perfectionist <3
wishText: Will always love you, maybe you have the best year
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!You mean so much to me, I enjoy spending every second with you. I am so so proud of you and very excited for this year. Can't wait to see you start your phd. I can't wait for all the pending cuddles and kisses we have. You are the best there is, bla bla bla
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: For someone as amazing as you I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
